short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: New tab with a beautiful background and a list of settings.
short.de: Frische neue Tabs für die tägliche Inspiration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An inspiration new tab for Chrome is a type of browser extension that replaces the default new tab page with a page that displays inspiring images, quotes, or other content designed to provide motivation or spark creativity.

There are many different types of inspiration new tab extensions available for Chrome, each with its own unique set of features and design elements. Some may include features such as daily quotes, to-do lists, weather updates, and custom backgrounds, while others may focus more on displaying visually striking images or artwork.

To find and install an inspiration new tab extension for Chrome, you can visit the Chrome Web Store and search for "inspiration new tab". From there, you can browse through the available options and read reviews to find one that suits your needs and preferences. Once you've found an extension you like, simply click the "Add to Chrome" button to install it and start using it as your default new tab page.
